numbered_ace_sentences: 1. In most sports, the majority of coaches are Caucasian.
2. In most sports, the majority of players are people of color.
3. Major League Baseball is an exception.
4. In Major League Baseball, the majority of players are Caucasian.
5. The average percentage of players of color in these sports is 68%.
6. The percentage of coaches who are people of color is 25.8%.
7. I wonder why Major League Baseball is the only sport in which the majority of players are Caucasian.
10. I am not sure how this situation impacts me personally.
12. I think that this situation does not impact my community much.
13. The headline is: Diversity of Major Sports.
